Авторы: Ekwo E.E., Weinberger M.M., Lachenbruch P.A., Huntley W.H.
Название: Relationship of parental smoking and gas cooking to respiratory disease in children
Организации: Division of Ambulatory and Community Pediatrics, Department of Pediatrics, The University of Iowa Medical School, Iowa City, IA, United States
Авторы организаций: Ekwo, E.E., Division of Ambulatory and Community Pediatrics, Department of Pediatrics, The University of Iowa Medical School, Iowa City, IA, United States; Weinberger, M.M., Division of Ambulatory and Community Pediatrics, Department of Pediatrics, The University of Iowa Medical School, Iowa City, IA, United States; Lachenbruch, P.A., Division of Ambulatory and Community Pediatrics, Department of Pediatrics, The University of Iowa Medical School, Iowa City, IA, United States; Huntley, W.H., Division of Ambulatory and Community Pediatrics, Department of Pediatrics, The University of Iowa Medical School, Iowa City, IA, United States
Краткое описание: In a survey of 1,355 children six to 12 years of age, the risk of hospitalization for respiratory illness among children before age two years was increased when gas was used for cooking at home (p < 0.001) or at least one of the parents smoked (p < 0.02). The occurrence of cough with colds in children also was significantly increased when one or both parents smoked (p < 0.001). Small but significant increases (p < .05) in the mean values of forced expiratory volume at one second, the flow rate at 75 percent of the forced vital capacity, and the forced expiratory flow rate from 25 percent to 75 percent of the vital capacity (FEF25-75) were seen after administering inhaled isoproterenol to children whose parents smoked (n = 94) but not among children whose parents did not smoke (n = 89); this was not seen in association with gas cooking. Thus, exposure of children during the first two years of life to gas cooking or cigarette smoking appears to be associated with an increased risk of hospitalization for respiratory illness, and cigarette smoking appears to be associated with a more consistent response to inhaled bronchodilator among six- to 12-year-old children with no other history of chronic respiratory illness.

Авторы: Liveright T., Stanbury M.
Название: An historical prospective study of mortality within a cohort of gas distribution workers
Организации: Environmental Sciences Laboratory, Mount Sinai School of Medicine, City University of New York, United States
Авторы организаций: Liveright, T., Environmental Sciences Laboratory, Mount Sinai School of Medicine, City University of New York, United States; Stanbury, M., Environmental Sciences Laboratory, Mount Sinai School of Medicine, City University of New York, United States
Краткое описание: An historical prospective study of mortality within a cohort of 1,410 gas distribution workers was conducted. This cohort was followed for ten years (1971–1980) and data on 118 deaths were obtained. Five‐year (1973–1977) averages of both St. Louis and United States age‐specific mortality figures were used to create “expected” mortality rates for comparison with the observed deaths in the cohort. Analyses of the cohort were done according to: 1) person‐years contributed during the study period (the “age‐attained” method) and 2) the number of years from commencement of work in the company until the end of the study period (1980) or death (the “latency” method). Using both the “age‐attained” and “latency” methods of analysis, Standardized Mortality Ratios (SMRs) were calculated for all causes of death, all malignant neoplasms, and for cardiovascular disease and malignant neoplasms of the respiratory and digestive systems. In no case was the SMR found to be beyond the range of what would be expected in the “standard” populations. While the present study does not contradict the negative findings of the one previous investigation of mortality of gas distribution workers, the limitations of small cohort size, reliance on death certificates and non‐industrial comparison populations make any conclusions at best provisional. Авторы: Stanbury M., Liveright T.
Название: Retirement disability among workers in a natural gas distribution company
Организации: Environmental Sciences Laboratory, Mt. Sinai School of Medicine, City University of New York, United States
Авторы организаций: Stanbury, M., Environmental Sciences Laboratory, Mt. Sinai School of Medicine, City University of New York, United States; Liveright, T., Environmental Sciences Laboratory, Mt. Sinai School of Medicine, City University of New York, United States
Краткое описание: Epidemiological investigations of occupational disability are severely limited because of the inherent difficulties in standardizing definitions of disability and because of the lack of appropriate comparison data. Nevertheless, occupational disability is of great concern to workers. An investigation of disability, defined as permanent retirement due to medical disability, among hourly employees of a natural gas distribution company was undertaken in response to a request by the employees' union. Because of the above limitations, a hypothesis‐generating rather than hypothesis‐testing approach was taken, utilizing both disability retirement incidence rates and a prevalence survey of the living disabled retirees. It was hypothesized from the analysis that this group of workers did experience an excess of retirement disability for the period 1971–1980 when compared to estimated disability incidence rates of the general Social Security insured population, and that this excess may have been due in part to an excess of musculoskeletal disabilities associated with occupational physical stresses and strains. Copyright © 1983 Wiley Periodicals, Inc., A Wiley Company

Авторы: Lindell M.K., Earle T.C.
Название: How Close Is Close Enough: Public Perceptions of the Risks of Industrial Facilities
Организации: Battelle Human Affairs Research Centers, 4000 N.E. 41st Street, Seattle, Washington, 98105, United States
Авторы организаций: Lindell, M.K., Battelle Human Affairs Research Centers, 4000 N.E. 41st Street, Seattle, Washington, 98105, United States; Earle, T.C., Battelle Human Affairs Research Centers, 4000 N.E. 41st Street, Seattle, Washington, 98105, United States
Краткое описание: Public opinion poll data have consistently shown that the proportion of respondents who are willing to have a nuclear power plant in their own community is smaller than the proportion who agree that more nuclear plants should be built in this country. Respondents’ judgments of the minimum safe distance from each of eight hazardous facilities confirmed that this finding results from perceived risk gradients that differ by facility (e.g., nuclear vs. natural gas power plants) and social group (e.g., chemical engineers vs. environmentalists) but are relatively stable over time. Ratings of the facilities on thirteen perceived risk dimensions were used to determine whether any of the dimensions could explain the distance data. Because the rank order of the facilities with respect to acceptable distance was very similar to the rank order on a number of the perceived risk dimensions, it is difficult to determine which of the latter is the critical determinant of acceptable distance if, indeed, there is only one. There were, however, a number of reversals of rank order that indicate that the respondents had a differentiated view of technological risk. Finally, data from this and other studies were interpreted as suggesting that perceived lack of any other form of personal control over risk exposure may be an important factor in stimulating public opposition to the siting of hazardous facilities. Copyright © 1983, Wiley Blackwell. All rights reserved

Название: Proposals for the Changeover of Furnaces of Oil or Gas Fired Boilers with Internal Flues to Coal Firing. [VORSCHLAEGE FUER DIE UMSTELLUNG DER FEUERUNGEN OEL- ODER GASGEFEUERTER FLAMMROHRKESSEL AUF KOHLE.]
Авторы организаций: Wieser, R.
Краткое описание: Unlike the cement industry the conversion of furnaces of boilers with internal flues from oil/gas to coal has not reached beyond a few beginnings in the Federal Republic of Germany up to now. Such a changeover, however, will make it possible to reduce the fuel costs by about 25% and the expenditure for the necessary investments will be repaid within a very few years. Two examples how such a conversion of the furnace of internal flue boilers will proceed are given and the requirements and problems which crop up are discussed. Such conversions of furnaces would also be welcomed from the point of view of the entire economy of the Federal Republic contributing to the reduction of oil and natural gas imports and diminishing of the coal dumps which have increased again recently. The magnitude of the possible savings of fuel expenditure can be seen from two 12 t/h boilers in a brewery where such a conversion saved more than DM 400,000 per annum.

Авторы: Wilcox H.A.
Название: The ocean as a supplier of food and energy.
Авторы организаций: Wilcox, H.A.
Краткое описание: This paper presents the concept of raising seaweeds and other valuable organisms with the aid of huge structures ('ocean farms') emplaced in the surface waters of the open oceans. Potential advantages from and difficulties to be expected in realizing the associated technologies are briefly set forth. Much of the published literature pertaining to the concept is referenced and summarized. Wave-powered upwelling of cool, nutrient-rich waters through vertical pipes extending to depths of 100-300 m is indicated as desirable. Technologies are outlined for using the harvested seaweeds to create foods and other valuable products such as animal feeds, fertilizers, fibers, plastics, synthetic natural gas (methane), and alcohol and gasoline fuels. Results from site selection studies and economic analyses are given. It appears that dynamically positioned farms orbiting with the surface current patterns typically found on the ocean will be most cost-effective. The general conclusion is stated that open ocean farming will become economically more feasible as the cheaper fossil fuels and food producing lands of the earth become increasingly consumed in the course of the next century.

Название: Occupational exposure to arsenic in a chemical plant: Health hazard evaluation after elimination of arsenic from the process [ESPOSIZIONE PROFESSIONALE AD ARSENICO IN UN IMPIANTO CHIMICO: VALUTAZIONE DEL RISCHIO DOPO ELIMINAZIONE DELL'ARSENICO DAL CICLO TECNOLOGICO]
Организации: Ist. Med. Lav., Univ. Cattol. S. Cuore, 00168 Roma, Italy
Авторы организаций: Carelli, G., Ist. Med. Lav., Univ. Cattol. S. Cuore, 00168 Roma, Italy; Bernardini, P.L., Ist. Med. Lav., Univ. Cattol. S. Cuore, 00168 Roma, Italy; la Bua, R., Ist. Med. Lav., Univ. Cattol. S. Cuore, 00168 Roma, Italy; Rimatori, V.; Iannaccone, A.
Краткое описание: Occupational exposure to arsenic occurred in 1978 in a natural gas desulphurization plant where sulphydric acid was absorbed from gas by an alkaline solution of sodium arsenite. In 1979 arsenicals were eliminated and a new desulphurization process was introduced. Environmental arsenic was then determined in 1981: concentrations were below safety criteria levels ranging between 0.0005 and 0.125 μg/m3. Samplings were also carried out on the ground, and arsenic was extracted with 2% Na2CO3: high concentrations (up to 2540 mg/m2) showed that accuracy in the workroom clearing was necessary. A 1.8 m soil core was collected near the old pollution sources, and arsenic was analyzed every 0.2 m. The soluble (in 2% Na2CO3) arsenic concentration decreased along the core up to 0.6 m; a value of 0.55 ± 0.09 mg/Kg (mean ± SD) was obtained from 0.6 to 1.8 m. Total arsenic (extracted with nitric acid) was higher. Arsenic concentration in the soil was comparable to values reported by other authors and accounted for the slight pollution. Analyses were carried out by flameless atomic absorption spectrophotometry after reduction to arsine.

Краткое описание: Guinea-pigs were immunized with anatheta-hemolysin preparations adsorbed on aluminum hydroxide, as well as with the mixture of anatheta-hemolysin and type A Cl. perfringens toxoid, purified and concentrated. Anatheta hemolysin preparations were obtained with the use of homogeneous theta hemolysin, as well theta hemolysin of various purification degrees. As a result, antatheta hemolytic guinea-pig sera capable of neutralizing 2,000-8,000 HU of theta-hemolysin were obtained. Tests made to establish the degree of protection in the immunized guinea-pigs did not show that the animals immunized with the mixture of anatheta-hemolysin and type A Cl. perfringens toxoid, purified and concentrated, had any advantages in the degree of protection over the animals immunized with the toxoid alone. But there is no doubt that this component plays a positive role under the conditions of natural gas gangrene when the hemolytic action of Cl. perfringens toxin becomes considerably pronounced.

Авторы: McConnell P., Hawbolt E.B., Cooke R.J.
Название: An instrumented impact study of acicular ferrite pipeline steels
Название источника: Journal of Materials for Energy Systems
Организации: Fracture Control Corporation, 340G S. Kellogg Avenue, Goleta, 93117, CA, United States; Department of Metallurgical Engineering, University of British Columbia, Vancouver, V6T 1W5, BC, Canada; Foothills Pipe Lines (Yukon) Ltd., 205 Fifth Avenue, S.W., Calgary, T2P 2W4, Alberta, Canada
Авторы организаций: McConnell, P., Fracture Control Corporation, 340G S. Kellogg Avenue, Goleta, 93117, CA, United States; Hawbolt, E.B., Department of Metallurgical Engineering, University of British Columbia, Vancouver, V6T 1W5, BC, Canada; Cooke, R.J., Foothills Pipe Lines (Yukon) Ltd., 205 Fifth Avenue, S.W., Calgary, T2P 2W4, Alberta, Canada
Краткое описание: The dynamic properties of two contemporary Canadian-manufactured, controlled-rolled acicular ferrite steels were characterized over a range of temperatures using instrumented impact testing. Instrumented impact testing provides dynamic load-time information from which the total energy absorbed in fracturing test specimens (the only parameter directly obtained with a noninstrumented impact machine) can be differentiated into a crack initiation and a crack propagation energy. Other parameters, notably fracture toughness values and dynamic yield strengths, can be measured. One of the acicular ferrite steels had been fully killed and rare-earth-treated, whereas the other was only semi-killed and had a relatively high sulfur content. The semi-killed steel exhibited highly directional properties due to the presence of elongated sulfide inclusions. The variances in composition and microstructure apparently resulted in the significant differences in the crack initiation and propagation energies and fracture toughness values between the two materials. The results were examined in terms of critical crack sizes in flat plate and in a gas pipeline configuration. Comments regarding the applicability of the data generated in this study to the evaluation of pipeline integrity have been made. © 1981 American Society for Metals.

Авторы: Kunreuther H., Lathrop J.W.
Название: Siting Hazardous Facilities: Lessons from LNG
Авторы организаций: Kunreuther, H.; Lathrop, J.W.
Краткое описание: This paper develops a descriptive framework for siting large scale technological facilities such as liquefied natural gas (LNG) terminals, and suggests ways of using analyses to improve the process. A key feature of these problems is that they involve relatively new technologies where there has not been a long history with which to construct a statistical data base. Hence the interested parties will each have different estimates of the probabilities and losses associated with events that affect the environment or safety of the population. The decision‐making process can be characterized as a sequence of decisions, subject to change over time, which are influenced by exogenous factors and new legislation. Each of the separate decisions involves an input phase and an interaction phase. The input phase specifies the relevant alternatives and attributes associated with a particular decision. The interaction phase focuses on the nature of the conflicts between the different parties in evaluating the alternatives. Conflicts are often difficult to resolve because each stakeholder in the process has his own objectives, a limited information base shaped by these objectives and scarce computational resources. We illustrate the above descriptive framework through a case study of the LNG siting process in California. The paper then explores possible ways of improving the input and interaction phases through more structured analyses. Specific attention is given to the role of decision analysis, the analytic hierarchy process, examining assumptions, and the use of interactive computer models for scenario generation. The paper concludes by suggesting future research needs on designing policy instruments for helping to reconcile conflicts between the vying interest parties. Promising areas for more problem‐focused research include the role of insurance and compensation schemes. Copyright © 1981, Wiley Blackwell. All rights reserved
Ключевые слова автора: conflict; decision processes; low probability events; Siting; use of analysis
Адрес для корреспонденции: Kunreuther, H.

Авторы: Brasser L.J.
Название: Polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbon concentrations in The Netherlands
Организации: Atmospheric Pollut. Div., TNO Res. Inst. Environm. Hyg., 2600 AE Delft, Netherlands
Авторы организаций: Brasser, L.J., Atmospheric Pollut. Div., TNO Res. Inst. Environm. Hyg., 2600 AE Delft, Netherlands
Краткое описание: Starting in the winter 1964-1965, the TNO Research Institute for Environmental Hygiene has determined the PAH-concentrations of the atmosphere at several locations in The Netherlands. Long series of data are available for several stations. The trend in the concentrations is spectacular: the concentrations have fallen from relatively high values to nearly negligible levels. During this period natural gas replaced coal and oil as a fuel for heating buildings. The same, though not complete, changes occurred in the fuels for the production of energy in factories and power stations. The intensity of road traffic has been growing rapidly during the same period. The conclusion can be drawn that modern motor traffic is not a major source of PAH. The relative proportions of different polycyclic hydrocarbons can give a clue for the detection of the kind of source of the PAH-concentrations. This is illustrated by the results of measurements at different stations. It is to be expected that in the not too far future, the relative proportions of the fuels used in The Netherlands will change again. This may have some influence on the concentrations of PAH in the atmosphere.

Авторы: Fairley W.B.
Название: Assessment for Catastrophic Risks
Организации: Analysis and Inference, Inc, 10 Post Office Square, Suite 970, Boston, Massachusetts, 02109, United States
Авторы организаций: Fairley, W.B., Analysis and Inference, Inc, 10 Post Office Square, Suite 970, Boston, Massachusetts, 02109, United States
Краткое описание: Records of nonoccurrence of catastrophic accidents from technologically based industrial operations, such as nuclear power generation and liquefied natural gas (LNG) transportation are sometimes cited as evidence of the safety of such operations. The appropriateness and inappropriateness of different types of models of accident processes for these systems are discussed. Selectivity biases in defining both die numerator and denominator for accident rates are shown to be important to the size of the estimated rate and these are illustrated by examples. Inferential approaches to estimating a rate based on zero occurrences are briefly discussed. The conclusion reached is that a record of zero occurrences is of cold comfort in ruling out catastrophic events. Experience, unless it is interpreted by strong models and assumptions, helps little to establish very small probabilities of a catastrophe. Copyright © 1981, Wiley Blackwell. All rights reserved

Авторы: Herbert J.T., Ortloff J.E.
Название: HIGH PRESSURE SWIVEL FOR NATURAL GAS SERVICE AND OSCILLATING MOTION IN A MARINE ENVIRONMENT.
Название источника: Research Report Series - University of Queensland, Department of Civil Engineering
Авторы организаций: Herbert, J.T.; Ortloff, J.E.
Краткое описание: A joint development program produced a unique flowline swivel for high pressure (6,000 psig (41,370 kPa) natural gas service under continuous, small degree rotation, oscillating service. The swivel uses an elastomeric bearing element made up of alternate, frustro-conical shaped rings of metal and rubber (elastomer) to absorb continuous small degree ( plus or minus 5 degree to plus or minus 6 degree ) rotary oscillations or flexures of the swivel. It accommodates larger oscillations, including complete 360 degree rotations, by locking the elastomeric element at its maximum design flexure capability (10 degree to 12 degree in either direction) and permitting the entire shaft assembly to rotate relative to the housing. A 6-in (152. 4mm), 6,000 psig (41,370 kPa) successfully passed a rigorous qualification test program which included one million cycles of flexure (from 0 degree to plus 4 one-half degree to minus 4 one-half degree and back to 0 degree ) at a rate of five cycles per minute. The test program also included a pressurized ″soak″ test with methane containing 10 percent (by volume) hydrogen sulfide.

Авторы: Johnson D.H., Kastenberg W.E., Griesmeyer J.M.
Название: Prospectives on the risks of alternative fuel cycles
Организации: Dept. Appl. Sci., UCLA, Los Angeles, Calif. 90024, United States
Авторы организаций: Johnson, D.H., Dept. Appl. Sci., UCLA, Los Angeles, Calif. 90024, United States; Kastenberg, W.E., Dept. Appl. Sci., UCLA, Los Angeles, Calif. 90024, United States; Griesmeyer, J.M., Dept. Appl. Sci., UCLA, Los Angeles, Calif. 90024, United States
Краткое описание: A commentary is provided on the uncertainties in the data and in qualifying the phenomena relating to the risks imposed by the various steps involved in the use of coal, oil, natural gas, hydropower, and nuclear fuels for the generation of electricity. Uncertainties appear to be extremely large for hydropower which exhibits both large scale ecological impacts and the potential for high consequence, moderate frequency events at specific sites. Major risk-related uncertainties with the use of nuclear fuels include those surrounding nuclear weapons proliferation and reactor accident frequencies and consequences. Uncertainties for coal and oil include specification of the damage function of air transported sulfates and the effects of atmospheric CO2 buildup, acid rain, and groundwater contamination from mine water runoff. Compoundig these problems is the potential impact of the growing global competition for a diminishing supply of oil. In the studies reviewed herein, the assessed risks of the nuclear fuel cycle are no greater than those of the primary alternatives. Prudence suggests that we do not totally reject any particular option at this time on the basis of health effects alone; similarly, no option is an undisputed choice.
Ключевые слова указателя: carbon dioxide; coal; hydrocarbon; electric power plant; energy; nuclear energy; prevention; risk factor

Название: The problem of carbon black toxicity: A review [MESSA A PUNTO CRITICA DEL PROBLEMA DELL'AZIONE TOSSICA DEL NEROFUMO]
Название источника: Giornale Italiano di Medicina del Lavoro
Организации: Industr. Pirelli SpA, 20126 Milano, Italy
Авторы организаций: Locati, G., Industr. Pirelli SpA, 20126 Milano, Italy; Sassi, C., Industr. Pirelli SpA, 20126 Milano, Italy
Краткое описание: The 'furnace' carbon black, widely used in the rubber industry, is a petroleum controlled combustion product or natural gas. Its well determinated physicial structure and chemical composition distinguish it from chimney soot. It has not been possible to produce malignancies experimentally with carbon black in any species of animals and with any way of administration. In workers exposed to a high quantity of dust (over 10 mg/m3) features of reticular pneumoconiosis and cases of chronic bronchitis, with respiratory function failure, were observed. Four wide epidemiological investigations could not demonstrate any cancer excess among production workers who were exposed to very high concentration of the black. In spite of this, the carbon black capacity to absorb polyaromatic hydrocarbon suggests that the latter could produce a cancerogenic action. Wide experimental studies demonstrated that this possibility does not exist in reality, in fact the very strong P.A.H. binding to the black particles resists all biological desorption processes.

Краткое описание: A method to completelt utilize digester gas has been studied and designed by the Metropolitan Sanitary District of Greater Chicago at its West-Southwest Plant. Data on the amount of gas produced, utilized, and wasted are compiled for one year on monthly basis. The dollar value of the wasted gas is determined in equivalent cost of natural gas. Three alternatives for the utilization of wasted gas are considered, namely: gas turbine generation, internal combustion engine prime mover, and low-pressure steam boilers. A study of low-pressure steam sources and steam demand at the west-Southwest Plant is presented along with the design considerations for the selection of equipment for the system. Certain things peculiar to the West-Southwest Plant, such as existing available buildings, existing pipelines, and the future expansion of the plant were taken into account in designing the system.

Авторы организаций: Pu, F., Lanzhou Inst. of Geology, Academia Sinica, China., China
Краткое описание: This article summarizes a wealth of geological and geochemical data concerning oil fields in China. From a study of paleo- climate, salt content, sedimentary hydrodynamics, geotectonics and other aspects, it is believed that the 'continental moist depression' is the basic requirement for the formation of continental oil and gas. It is also pointed out that a humid and semi-humid climate, long steady sinking of the earth's crust, fresh-brackish water medium and hydrodynamically still environment in the centre of a lake are more favourable for the formation of oil and gas.-from Authors

Авторы: Rall D.P., Auerbach S., Friedlander S.
Название: Report on health and environmental effects of increased coal utilization
Организации: Nat. Inst. Environm. Hlth Sci., Research Triangle Park, N.C., United States
Авторы организаций: Rall, D.P., Nat. Inst. Environm. Hlth Sci., Research Triangle Park, N.C., United States; Auerbach, S., Nat. Inst. Environm. Hlth Sci., Research Triangle Park, N.C., United States; Friedlander, S., Nat. Inst. Environm. Hlth Sci., Research Triangle Park, N.C., United States
Краткое описание: The National Energy Plan announced by President Carter on April 29, 1977 proposed a significant increase in the utilization of the vast domestic deposits of coal to replace the dwindling supplies of oil and natural gas, and increasingly expensive oil from foreign sources, to meet national energy needs. At the same time, in recognition of possible adverse health and ecological consequences of increased coal production and use, the President announced that a special committee would be formed to study this aspect of the National Energy Plan. The Committee held a series of public meetings during November and December 1977 to review a number of special papers on particular problems associated with increased coal utilization. These papers, which were prepared by scientists of the US Environmental Protection Agency; the Department of Energy; the HEW National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health, and the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences; New York University; and Vanderbilt University; provided essential background information for the deliberations of the Committee and were published in EHP Vol. 33, pp. 127-314, 1979. One paper by A.P. Altschuler et al. is published in this volume of EHP. The committee's basic finding was that it is safe to proceed with plans to increase the utilization of coal if the following environmental and safety policies are adhered to: Compliance with Federal and State air, water, and solid waste regulations. Universal adoption and successful operation of best available control technology on new facilities. Compliance with reclamation standards. Compliance with mine health and safety standards. Judicious siting of coal-fired facilities. The Committee concluded that, even with the best mitigation policies, there will be some adverse health and environmental effects from the dramatic increase in coal use. However, these will not impact all regions and individuals uniformly. The Committee identified six major areas of uncertainty and concern requiring further investigation if the nation is to minimize undesirable consequences of increased coal utilization now, and in the future. Two critical health issues of concern are air pollution health effects and coal mine worker health and safety. Two critical environmental issues are global effects of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere and acid fallout. Two additional important issues of concern are trace elements in the environment and reclamation of arid land. Finally, because of the inadequate data and methodology used in the study of these matters, the Committee strongly recommended the establishment of an improved national environmental data collection, modeling and monitoring system.
Ключевые слова указателя: carbon dioxide; coal; nitrogen oxide; sulfur dioxide; climate; combustion; normal human; prevention; therapy

Краткое описание: In a chemical plant arsenicals are used to eliminate hydrogen sulphide traces from natural gas. Neurological alterations in exposed subjects were looked for: 64 clinical examinations and 47 electromyographys with nervous motor conduction were found. Nervous motor conduction speed was not correlated with exposure intensity and/or length. In conclusion, in the exposure range studied, arsenicals did not cause neurological alterations which could be demonstrated by the methods used.

Авторы: Luthy Richard G., Sekel Deborah J., Tallon James T.
Название: BIOLOGICAL TREATMENT OF SYNTHETIC FUEL WASTEWATER
Название источника: American Society of Civil Engineers, Journal of the Environmental Engineering Division
Авторы организаций: Luthy, Richard G.; Sekel, Deborah J.; Tallon, James T.
Краткое описание: A wastewater biological treatability study was performed with effluent from the Grand Forks Energy Technology Center slagging fixed-bed coal gasification process. It was found that ammonia stripped wastewater could be processed reliably at 33% strength at substrate removal rates less than approximately 0. 6 mg COD removed/mg MLVSS-day. The wastewater when diluted to 33% strength contained highest reported concentration of organic contaminants in coal conversion effluents processed successfully by air activated sludge. The bacterial yield coefficient for treatment of 33% strength stripped wastewater was 0. 29 (COD basis) and the endogenous respiration rate coefficient was 0. 038 day**S**-**1 (COD basis). Raw wastewater with no ammonia removed could be processed at 40% strength. Nitrification was feasible with both stripped and unstripped wastewater. COD removal rates which impaired nitrification were dependent on ammonia loading, as nitrification could be sustained at higher values of substrate rate with unstripped wastewater than was observed with stripped wastewater.
Ключевые слова указателя: Coal gasification; Natural gas; WATER POLLUTION - Water Quality; BIOLOGICAL TREATMENT; WASTEWATER TREATMENT; Wastewater

Авторы: Bates D.V.
Название: Community air pollution in Canada: a review and predictions for the 1980s
Организации: Dept. Hlth Care Epidemiol., Univ. Brit. Columbia, Vancouver, B.C. V69 1W5, Canada
Авторы организаций: Bates, D.V., Dept. Hlth Care Epidemiol., Univ. Brit. Columbia, Vancouver, B.C. V69 1W5, Canada
Краткое описание: The main trends in Canada air pollution since the national program of surveillance began are reviewed in this paper. In common with the United States, significant improvements in sulfur dioxide and particulate pollution have been recorded in a number of cities after the institution of control measures. However, some areas with a concentration of certain industries still have considerable particulate pollution. Since emission of nitrogen dioxide is increasing in the United States, the consequent photochemical pollution in southern Ontario will probably continue to increase. Nitrogen dioxide concentrations in the air are elevated in some western Canadian cities, presumably because of the presence of plants that burn natural gas to generate electricity and increasing pollution from automobiles. There is increasing concern about community air pollution in cities with large metal-fabricating plants, and community exposure to asbestos fibres is likely to be an important concern in the 1980s.

Авторы: Malashenko I.R., Romanovskaia V.A., Kryshtab T.P., Pogrebnoǐ I.P.
Название: Diauxotrophic properties of microorganisms assimilating C2--C4 hydrocarbons [Diauksotrofnye svoistva mikroorganizmov, assimiliruiushchikh uglevodorody C2--C4.]
Авторы организаций: Malashenko, I.R.; Romanovskaia, V.A.; Kryshtab, T.P.; Pogrebnoǐ, I.P.
Краткое описание: Diauxotrophic properties of bacteria assimilating gaseous hydrocarbons C2--C4 and other complex organic substances but not methane were studied. If the medium contained two substrates (hydrocarbon+carbohydrate), the non-growing cells of the strains did not display diauxotrophic properties. In the phase of exponential growth, oxygen-containing carbon sources and then gaseous hydrocarbons were assimilated, i.e. diauxia was observed. If a microbial association containing an obligate methylotroph and a facultative gas-assimilating culture was grown on a medium with a natural gas, the latter culture assimilated carbon-containing metabolites of the methylotroph and then, when their concentration decreased, gaseous hydrocarbons. The order in which complex organic substances (exometabolites of methylotrophs) and hydrocarbons C2--C4 were assimilated was determined by their concentration in the medium. In the course of growth of such a microbial association, the inhibiting effect of metabolites of methylotrophs on their growth decreased as well as the loss of methane being transformed by methylotrophs into exometabolites, and hydrocarbons C2--C4 were utilized.

Название: The application of nuclear techniques to high temperature oxidation studies
Организации: Department of Physics, Schuster Laboratory, University of Manchester, United Kingdom; Department of Metallurgy, University of Manchester, United Kingdom
Авторы организаций: Calvert, J.M., Department of Physics, Schuster Laboratory, University of Manchester, United Kingdom; Lees, D.G., Department of Metallurgy, University of Manchester, United Kingdom
Краткое описание: The18O(p, α)15N reaction has been used to determine the18O distribution in the oxides of a number of alloys which have been oxidised sequentially in natural gas and18O-labelled gas. A significant feature of all the cases investigated is the penetration of18O into the oxide formed previously in the natural gas. This penetration may occur in various ways and would be difficult to study by other techniques. The evidence presented here shows that there are subtle differences in oxidation behaviour and confirms that penetration of oxygen is a feature in the oxidation of alloys in which the predominant mechanism is transport of cations. This may have implications in explanations given to account for oxidation kinetics and adhesion and buckling of scales. © 1979 Akadémiai Kiadó.

Название: Effectiveness of Heat Pump Processes when Applying Synthetic Fuels as Driven Energy. [EFFEKTIVITAET VON WAERMEPUMPENPROZESSEN BEI VERWENDUNG VON SYNTHETISCHEN KRAFTSTOFFEN ALS ANTRIEBSENERGIE.]
Авторы организаций: Kirn, Herbert
Краткое описание: Diesel- and natural gas heat pumps will yield a better utilization of the applied primary energy than electrically driven heat pumps; Diesel oil and natural gas, however are mainly imported energy products and industrial raw materials which will become exhausted within a reasonable space of time. The primary energy products for the generation of electric current are chiefly indigenous products or otherwise energy sources hardly or only with difficulty to be utilized, such as peat, brown coal, power station coal, water power and uranium. The following paper examines how effectively the Diesel and gas heat pump processes change, if the fuel for the drive is no longer natural gas or natural oil but will have to be won by liquefaction or gasification of coal. It will become evident, that the entire process of driving a heat pump by electricity, produced from coal, is more effective than by using fuel made of coal.

Краткое описание: Within the scope of the Belgian national R-D Program Environment-Air (1975-78) a study was executed concerning air pollution by space heating in the test area Gent. In the first phase of this project a methodology was developed for the calculation of emissions of pollutants generated by space heating. A study was made concerning the geographic situation, heating installations and fuel consumption of a series of building categories dwellings, government buildings, schools, the profit sector and other activities, i.e. conservatories). The relationship between daily fuel consumption and outdoor temperature is estimated by a degree-day system. For drawing up an emission inventory of the area Gent, this information was combined with a list of emission factors. Results show over the period 1970-77 a decrease about 30% of emissions of sulfur dioxide; this is caused mainly by a substitution in domestic fuel of coal by natural gas.

Авторы: Travis C.C., Watson A.P., McDowell-Boyer L.M.
Название: Natural and technologically enhanced sources of Radon-222
Организации: Technol. Assessment. Sect., Hlth. Safety Res. Div., Oak Ridge Nat. Lab., Oak Ridge, Tenn., United States
Авторы организаций: Travis, C.C., Technol. Assessment. Sect., Hlth. Safety Res. Div., Oak Ridge Nat. Lab., Oak Ridge, Tenn., United States; Watson, A.P., Technol. Assessment. Sect., Hlth. Safety Res. Div., Oak Ridge Nat. Lab., Oak Ridge, Tenn., United States; McDowell-Boyer, L.M., Technol. Assessment. Sect., Hlth. Safety Res. Div., Oak Ridge Nat. Lab., Oak Ridge, Tenn., United States
Краткое описание: An assessment of 222Rn releases (curies/year) from major natural and technologically enhanced sources in the United States is presented. The resulting inhalation population dose commitments to the bronchial epithelium of the lung (lung-rem) are also estimated. The sources of radon considered are natural soil, evapotranspiration, potable water supplies, building materials, natural gas, uranium mining and milling, coal and phosphate mining, phosphate fertilizer, liquefied petroleum gas, geothermal power facilities, coal-fired power plants, and gas and oil wells. The most important natural source of 222Rn is decay of 226Ra in the soil and rocks of the earth's crust. This source results in approximately 40% of the total population dose from all sources of radon. The largest technologically enhanced contributor to population dose is airborne 222Rn in building interiors, which is estimated to contribute 55% to the total population exposure to 222Rn. Each of the other sources is estimated to contribute less than 3% to the total.An assessment of **2**2**2Rn releases (curies/year) from major natural and technologically enhanced sources in the United States is presented. The resulting inhalation population dose commitments to the bronchial epithelium of the lung (lung-rem) are also estimated.

Авторы: Shafer S.
Название: An ecological history of coal refuse bank fires in Scranton, Pennsylvania
Название источника: Social Science and Medicine. Part C Medical Geography
Организации: Robert Wood Johnson Clinical Scholars Program, Columbia University, United States
Авторы организаций: Shafer, S., Robert Wood Johnson Clinical Scholars Program, Columbia University, United States
Краткое описание: Of the 500 burning coal refuse heaps in the U.S.A. during the 1960s, Scranton, Pennsylvania had far more fires in far larger waste piles than any other community. Its population was the only sizable one in the country exposed to these smoldering sulfurous culm banks, most of which had persisted for decades. Research into suspected health effects of these culm bank fires and the severe local air pollution to which they added prompted an historical review of their origins and management. Their story begins in the region's geomorphology-highly faulted beds of anthracite unique in the world. It continues through the fortunes of the anthracite industry, which peaked as a major fuel supplier for the nation, then rapidly declined to the status of a minor employer. It concludes with the arduous, now completed, task of mobilizing the political and engineering capability to put out the refractory fires. An account of Scranton's culm bank fires and their control describes the changing human ecology of a region as its prized natural resource and major export is devalued in competition with oil and natural gas. The relationship of industrial settlements to resource distribution, of solid waste to gross industry, of citizens to public nuisances and of technical know-how to legislation are some of the themes of human geography running through the chronicle of this public health hazard. The themes are common: the setting not so. © 1979.
Ключевые слова указателя: coal; air pollution; ecology; fire; waste disposal; Air Pollutants, Environmental; Air Pollutants, Occupational; Coal Mining; Ecology; Fires; Human; Pennsylvania; Refuse Disposal

Авторы: Vermeulen A.J.
Название: Acid precipitation in The Netherlands
Организации: Dept. Environm. Contr. Prov. North-Holland, Haarlem, Netherlands
Авторы организаций: Vermeulen, A.J., Dept. Environm. Contr. Prov. North-Holland, Haarlem, Netherlands
Краткое описание: There is a pronounced relationship between the total interior SO2 emission and the acidification of precipitation in The Netherlands. However, no such relationship can be demonstrated for NO(x) emissions and acidification, probably because more than 40% of NO(x) are emitted at a height of 30 cm above road level, which make it assumable that this part of NO(x) will be absorbed by the direct surroundings. The remaining 60% (170,000 tons) will hardly play a role in acidification. The coming years in the Netherlands will be characterized by a decreasing use of natural gas and an increasing use of oil with this consequence: an increasing emission of SO2. Solar, wind and nuclear energy are unlikely to play a major role in the total generation of energy before 1985, and after 1985 their contribution will hardly be more than about 5% in the year 2000 unless, within a few years, the Dutch Government begins building a number of nuclear power plants. An important alternative source of energy after 1985 is probably the gasification of coal. One expects that in The Netherlands, in 1985, the price of gas obtained by gasification of coal will be competitive with those of the fuels in use today. Summarizing it can be postulated that from now till 1985, with a decreasing share of natural gas, oil will become the main fuel in The Netherlands. In the 1985 to 2000 period it is most probable that oil will remain the main fuel for the first decade, but slowly the gasification of coal (perhaps together with nuclear energy) will become competitive with oil.
Ключевые слова указателя: acid; nitrogen oxide; sulfur dioxide; geographic distribution; Netherlands; precipitation

Авторы организаций: Salamov, A.A.
Краткое описание: The total output of power situations in France in 1976 amounted to the approximately 52 GW; of this figure 30 GW is produced by thermal power stations, 19 GW by hydroelectric stations and 3 GW by nuclear power stations. Thirty four percent of the stations are coal fired, 44% are oil fired and 7% of the power stations rely on natural gas. A method developed by the Electricite de France for testing SO2 emission levels in the vicinity of power stations is described. Current measures to combat SO2 emissions (Saint Ouin power station), thermal pollution (Porcheville station) and heat loss (Paris) are described. Particular attention is paid to heat recovery with supply to neighbouring housing schemes, hospitals and schools.

Авторы: Traversin J.
Название: Storage and transfer of liquefied natural gas in Zeebrugge [LE STOCKAGE ET LE TRANSBORDEMENT DE GNL A ZEEBRUGGE]
Авторы организаций: Traversin, J.
Краткое описание: Preparatory works have been begun for the construction of a liquefied natural gas terminal in the outer harbour of Zeebrugge, so that by the end of 1982 Belgium will be able to accommodate tankers from Algeria. The terminal will consist essentially of a landing stage, 3 reservoirs of 80,000 c. metres capacity constructed of concrete caissons sunk into the ground, and a gas conversion installation. This paper examines the safety measures to be taken within the terminal together with plans for the construction and disposition of measures to be taken to protect the working personnel and the nearby population in the event of a technical failure. The excellent safety records in the numerous similar installations already functioning throughout the world show that the safety measures already in use have proved effective.

Авторы: Berka I.
Название: Mass poisoning by carbon monoxide
Организации: Krajska Hyg. Stan., Brno, Czech Republic
Авторы организаций: Berka, I., Krajska Hyg. Stan., Brno, Czech Republic
Краткое описание: Forty six girls of an apprentice-boarding house were partially poisoned during sleep by carbon dioxide leaking from a defective boiler of central heating as a result of imperfect combustion of natural gas. The combustion products spread from the boiler house situated in the basement through a staircase into the bedrooms of the boarding house at the second floor. The level of COHb in the affected girls was 15 to 40%. In most 16- to 17-yr girls, the poisoning was of light or medium degree, leaving no consequences because of interrupted exposure. Since a reconstruction of the event made it clear that the concentration of carbon monoxide in the bedrooms of the girls would have further increased throughout the night, it became evident that a further stay in the poisoned atmosphere would most probable have had tragic consequences.

Название: Diffusion of combustion gasses in the direct neighbourhood of a chimney. Field measurements on a heating plant of 4300 kW

Краткое описание: The material concerns the combustion gases produced by the boiler house central heating installation of the VEG Gas Instituut n.v. The boiler house contains atmospheric CH boilers with a nominal load of 1437 kW each. Measurement details and apparatus used are described. All half hour values are represented on paper and distinguished per point source; their 24 hr averages are calculated to generate the basic pollution data from the air monitor. The authors use the diffusion model developed by Halitsky for distance relationships around a point source. The conclusions reported suggest that a relatively simple set of rules could be devised for assessing the distance from point source to environment to meet the required standards. The results did not suggest any systematic influence of wind speed on concentration figures. There are some indications however that distance from the source plays a role. Further wind tunnel test will clarify this.
Ключевые слова указателя: carbon monoxide; natural gas; nitrogen oxide; atmospheric diffusion; chimney; combustion; methodology

The advantages and drawbacks of electric, natural gas, and oil heating of such furnaces are discussed and compared. Авторы: Preston F.S.
Название: Helicopter support of North Sea oil exploration
Организации: British Airways Med. Serv., Speedbird House, London, United Kingdom
Авторы организаций: Preston, F.S., British Airways Med. Serv., Speedbird House, London, United Kingdom
Краткое описание: Exploration for oil beneath the North Sea started in the early 1960's with the discovery of natural gas and oil in the southern part between the coasts of East Anglia and the Netherlands. Since then oil exploration has built up considerably, the main effort moving northwards between the Shetland Islands and the Norwegian coasts. The helicopter offered the most direct and rapid contact with off-shore oil rigs and since these early days an immense helicopter operation has been built up round the borders of the North Sea by all the nations involved. Flying conditions in this area, particularly in winter, are at times difficult if not to say hazardous. Nevertheless, a sophisticated helicopter support service has been built up using modern aircraft and equipment which is unique in aviation history. This paper attempts to trace the history of the service, the operational problems involved and the special needs such as survival equipment and clothing. In addition, a co-ordinated air/sea rescue service largely based on helicopters has been built up and provides not only rescue facilities for possible rig disasters but also for shipping emergencies in the area.

Краткое описание: Untill early 1977 Hoechst Holland N.V. operated 3 inert gas plants based on natural gas with a total capacity or 5000 Nm3/hr. The planned production capacity increase necessitated an increase of inert gas supply. Various production alternatives were examined for efficiency and economy. The 5 alternatives reviewed included: maintenance of the present system with no new investment; partial replacement of N2 by inert gas from existing plant; a new small inert gas plant for partial replacement of N2; new large capacity inert gas plant based on the Marlo therm Oven gas; and new large capacity plant based on flue gas from boilers. The last alternative proved to be superior in terms of inert gas price and mixture price (inert gas plus N2). The alternatives are briefly described.

Авторы: Trautman D.D.
Название: Self clean up pays off
Авторы организаций: Trautman, D.D.
Краткое описание: To beat natural gas shortage and combat rising fuel prices, trash and garbage are being burnt to generate enough heat to save over 14.6 million ft3 of gas annually. The energy is used to heat homes, and in drying ovens. The heat is created in a pyrolysis waste disposal system in which a combustible gas is generated in the primary burning chamber. As a result, the process burns up its own smoke and emissions are far below air pollution control standards. The process is described in detail, and the fuel savings are discussed.
Ключевые слова указателя: CHEMICAL OPERATIONS - Pyrolysis; HEAT EXCHANGERS - Waste Heat Utilization; REFUSE DISPOSAL - Incineration; REFUSE INCINERATORS; energy resource; incineration; prevention; solid waste management; therapy

Авторы: De Renzo D.J.
Название: Energy from bioconversion of waste materials
Авторы организаций: De Renzo, D.J.
Краткое описание: One method of supplementing the natural gas supply is by anaerobically digesting organic materials to produce methane which is the major constituent of natural gas. The sources of waste for bioconversion are listed (agricultural crops, forests, urban wastes, agricultural wastes, ainmal wastes and industrial wastes) and the potential for methane fermentation of waste meterials is discussed. Bioconversion mechanisms are described. Studies on the bioconversion of solid waste and sewage sludge are reported and methods of urban trash methanation are listed. Animal waste digestion, industrial waste treatment and the production of methane from energy crops are discussed. Using sulfur dioxide, hydrogen fluoride and hydrogen chloride as examples of important air pollutants in Europe, a discussion of the characteristic effects of these pollutants is presented. Apparatus for experimental determination of air pollution effects, air analyses, plant and soil analyses and the determination of plant responses are described. Experimental analysis of the effects of gaseous pollutants is performed and comparisons are made of the phytotoxic characteristics of sulfur dioxide, hydrogen fluoride and hydrogen chloride. A discussion of the suitability of plant responses as a basis for air pollution control measures is presented.
Ключевые слова указателя: methane; agricultural worker; book; energy conservation; industry; prevention; sewage treatment; therapy; waste management

Авторы: Harima M.
Название: Energy conservation, environment reservation & safety measures by Japanese chemical industry
Авторы организаций: Harima, M.
Краткое описание: Technology is expected to play the primary role in solving the three contradictory problems the Japanese chemical industry faces under limited geographical, resource and economic conditions: environmental control, safety design and energy saving. Proper solutions to these problems can only be given by developing new processes, modifying catalysts and machinery, designing new machinery models, and employing computers for process operation. Environmental control and energy saving remain important subjects in studying use of clean energy sources such as power, LPG, LNG and naphtha especially when their production steps are considered. In view of the recent energy policy, environmental standards will be tighter while energy saving has to continue in the use of oil, natural gas and coal. Besides, new energy sources must be developed. Stockpiling of oil can be a means of energy saving, but the necessary facilities tend to be huge. This demands strict safety measures. A seismic design is being established on the basis of advanced stress analysis. The outcome is indispensable particularly for atomic equipment and structures. Use of oil and coal mixtures has already been started in quite a few places. If oil prices keep going up, coal may be substituted in Japan. Data and facilities for coal will have to be thoroughly reviewed then. Enlarged equipment will need a new design and operation concept in such attempts. The three subjects of energy saving, environmental control and safety measures in Japan are accompanied by many difficultues. The chemical industry in particular attempts to resolve them with technology. For the entire Japanese industry, too, transport systems, shipping, energy saving in household practices, and importance of energy must be considered.
Ключевые слова указателя: nitrogen oxide; air quality control; chemical industry; desulfurization; energy; flue gas; furuncle; prevention; therapy

Авторы: Paul R.
Название: Some possible effects of natural gas leakages on townscape trees [QUELQUES EFFETS POSSIBLES DES FUITES DE GAZ NATUREL SUR LES ARBRES D'ALIGNEMENT DES VILLES]
Организации: Dept. Biol. Veg. Theorique Appl., Fac. Sci. Agronom. Etat, Gembloux, Belgium

Краткое описание: Natural gas leakages are often held responsible for the death of trees in cities. A review of the literature shows that the presence of natural gas in the soil has physical, chemical and microbiological effects that threaten trees. Essentially, these are anerobiotic effects, of physical as well as microbiological origin, reductor effects that cause the formation of sulphates and ammonia, and microbiological effects which among other things cause the production of highly phytotoxic comppounds such as ethylene. The symptoms of the affected trees are very little specific. After repair of the leak, certain precautions will have to be taken regardless of whether it is attempted to save the tree or a new one is planted.
Ключевые слова указателя: natural gas; higher plant; tree

Авторы: Gambs Gerard C.
Название: INDUSTRIAL ENERGY IN THE UNITED STATES - ROLE OF COAL, NATURAL AND SYNTHETIC GAS, AND NUCLEAR POWER.
Авторы организаций: Gambs, Gerard C.
Краткое описание: The United States is at a crossroads in its needs for an adequate energy supply and its potential for continued economic growth. Under current conditions, it is unrealistic to expect the U. S. energy industry to produce 1 billion tons of coal annually by 1985 to replace much of the oil now being imported. Some reports predict that coal will account for only 21% of the total U. S. energy consumption by the year 2000, compared with 18% in 1975. Just to reach the same coal production capacity that was in place before the Mine Safety Act of 1969, U. S. industry would have to develop 200 new coal mines, each with a capacity of 1 million tons per year (30-40 million per mine. ) The role of natural gas, synthetic gas and nuclear power is also discussed in this review paper.
Ключевые слова указателя: Coal deposits; Natural gas; Nuclear fuels; INDUSTRIAL ENERGY; Energy resources
Адрес для корреспонденции: Gambs, Gerard C.

Авторы: Robinson E.A.
Название: Geophysical Exploration for Petroleum and Natural Gas
Организации: consultant to Amoco Prod. Co., Tulsa, OK., United States
Авторы организаций: Robinson, E.A., consultant to Amoco Prod. Co., Tulsa, OK., United States
Краткое описание: The fundamental digital processing techniques used to analyze seismic records taken in the exploration for petroleum and natural gas are described. These methods include the determination of the seismic velocity function for a prospect, static and dynamic corrections to the seismic traces, multiple coverage of a prospect and stacking, and deconvolution. The concept of minimum phase, or, what is the same thing, the concept of minimum delay, is defined and it is shown that a positive net down-going energy flow in a layered medium results in minimum-delay down-going wave motion. Seismic migration may be defined as the extrapolation of a wave field from a known boundary at the surface of the earth to an unknown boundary within the earth that depicts the geologic structure. The methods of maximum-convexity migration, and its equivalent, wavefront migration, as well as wave-equa-tion migration, are given. Finally the statistical time-series model used in the method of the predictive deconvolution of seismic traces is presented, and it is shown that the method of predictive deconvolution is a valid method for removing either long-period or short-period reverberations even in the case of a nonminimum-delay source pulse. Copyright © 1977 by The Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers, Inc.
Ключевые слова указателя: DATA PROCESSING; GEOPHYSICS; NATURAL GAS; PETROLEUM EXPLORATION; PETROLEUM PROSPECTING

Авторы: Van Der Brugghen F.W.
Название: Desulfurization of flue gases (Dutch)
Авторы организаций: Van Der Brugghen, F.W.
Краткое описание: Electricity generation in the Netherlands has mainly relied on natural gas as its basic energy source. Today, the government's natural gas conservation policy implies a return to or increased use of coal and oil fired power stations. This will have its consequences for SO2 levels. The author presents a general state of the art of flue gas desulfurization techniques to date. In three paragraphs, the principal desulfurization techniques are briefly reviewed: fuel desulfurization; desulfurization during incineration; flue gas desulfurization. Each technique produces its own waste product difficulties. Costs incurred in installing further elaborate scrubbing plant will probably lead to increased electricity prices in the order of one to two cents per kWh.

Авторы: Hellwig A., Lebert L., Patz G.
Название: On possible mercury occurrence in the air, and methods of its determination [UBER MOGLICHKEITEN DES AUFTRETENS VON QUECKSILBER IN DER LUFT UND METHODEN ZU SEINER BESTIMMUNG]
Название источника: Zeitschrift fur die Gesamte Hygiene und Ihre Grenzgebiete
Организации: Hyg. Inst., Magdeburg, Germany
Авторы организаций: Hellwig, A., Hyg. Inst., Magdeburg, Germany; Lebert, L., Hyg. Inst., Magdeburg, Germany; Patz, G., Hyg. Inst., Magdeburg, Germany
Краткое описание: As an enviromental poison, mercury is gaining increasing importance, particularly with regard to the consumption of foodstuffs. It is widely distributed in nature and found in soils as well as coal and mineral oil. Its content in deposits of natural gas has been reported in the Netherlands, GDR and GFR. The use of these fuels implies the danger of a possible contamination of the air which requires exact control in the interest of health protection. Both the dithiazone method and techniques based on atomic absorption spectrophotometry can be used to determine the mercury content in air. Whereas the former requires a great amount of manual work and time, the latter, based on flameless atomic absorption spectrophotometry is more suitable. An apparatus was developed for this analysis and results of analyses performed with the apparatus are presented.
Ключевые слова указателя: mercury; mercury; air pollution; methodology; air pollutant; air pollution; article; chemical industry; technique; Air Pollutants; Air Pollutants, Environmental; Air Pollution; Chemical Industry; English Abstract; Mercury; Methods

Авторы: Dezarzens A.F.
Название: Natural gas and its effects on vegetation [LE GAZ NATUREL ET SON INFLUENCE SUR LA VEGETATION]
Авторы организаций: Dezarzens, A.F.
Краткое описание: Natural gas is nontoxic, odorless, has twice the pressure of normal gas and is dryer. The use of plants as a test for natural gas leakage is described, as experience has shown that 'nontoxic' natural gas causes damage to plants. As natural gas is dryer than coal gas, it dries out the rope and rubber joints and seams in old, unwelded gas pipes. Where a serious increase in leakage occurs, up to 40% of the gas transported can be lost (mean, 4 to 6%). The gas pressure is twice that of other gas, which accelerates distribution in the earth. The effects of natural gas on plants are little or no growth in spring, production of small leaves, hardening of buds, desiccation and premature leaf fall, desiccation of branches, bark fall, blue violet color and typical odor in roots.
Ключевые слова указателя: natural gas; plant; vegetation

Авторы: De La Chevallerie H.
Название: Ecology of trees in town streets [OKOLOGIE DER STRASSENBAUME]
Авторы организаций: De La Chevallerie, H.
Краткое описание: The environmental value of trees in towns is described, and the possible causes of death of roadside trees are discussed. These causes include underground leakage of natural gas, salt application in icy weather, chemical weed control on pavements, soil pollution by oil, soil consolidation, paving with asphalt, root losses and trunk damage. Possible measures to remedy tree damage are mentioned and general directions for the planning and cultivation of streetside trees are given.

Авторы: Foos K.
Название: Natural gas in the region of the root system is actively noxious to poplars [ERDGAS IM WURZELRAUM SCHADIGT PAPPELN AKTIV]
Организации: Inst. Biol. Holzforsch., Forstwissenschaftl. Fak., Univ. Freiburg im Br., Germany
Авторы организаций: Foos, K., Inst. Biol. Holzforsch., Forstwissenschaftl. Fak., Univ. Freiburg im Br., Germany
Краткое описание: Cuttings of Populus sp. 'Oxford' were grown for three and seven weeks in an aerated nutrient solution. The plants were then treated with nitrogen and natural gas, the control being aerated as before. Natural gas inhibited growth more than nitrogen. Since the inhibition with both gases differs only quantitatively, the additional effect of natural gas is probably due to a stronger displacement of oxygen, which might be caused by diffusion of the light methane component into the intercellular spaces. Oxygen deficiency resulted in outgrowths of the lenticells which probably excrete volatile products of anaerobic respiration. They are to be regarded as part of a system adaptive to oxygen deficiency. The smaller root system of the cuttings grown for three weeks with air survived the transition to oxygen deficiency without sudden damage, whereas the larger ones of the cuttings grown for seven weeks with air died within 5 days.
Ключевые слова указателя: methane; natural gas; nitrogen; age; growth; inhibition; plant; theoretical study

Авторы: Hahn E., Herpers Th. E., Neff I.
Название: Modern procedures for the removal of H2S and NH3 from coke oven gas [MODERNE TECHNIKEN ZUM ENTFERNEN VON H2S UND NH3 AUS KOKEREIGAS]
Организации: Dr. C. Otto & Co. GmbH, Bochum, Germany
Авторы организаций: Hahn, E., Dr. C. Otto & Co. GmbH, Bochum, Germany; Herpers Th., E., Dr. C. Otto & Co. GmbH, Bochum, Germany; Neff, I., Dr. C. Otto & Co. GmbH, Bochum, Germany
Краткое описание: Old and new procedures for removal of H2S and NH3 from coke oven gas are described and compared, with detailed flow sheets of the plant units and chemical reagents used. The Otto ammonium sulfide process is a typical neutralization process, depending on washing the gas with an ammonia solution to remove H2S. The waste water contains only small amounts of NH3, H2S and other contaminants specific to the plant in use and these can, for the most part, be reused in the process. The Stretford process is suitable for removal of H2S from natural gas, refinery gas, coke oven gas and waste gases from viscose, crude oil and petrochemical industries. It is based on oxidation (multistage) of H2S to elementary sulfur by a sodium carbonate solution containing sodium vanadate and anthraquinone disulfonic acid. The process produces a gas with a H2S concentration less than 2 ppm. The waste waters contain sodium thiosulfate and sodium thiocyanate, which can be removed. The Sidmar Otto process depends on oxidation of the H2S to sulfur by a complex of iron(III) with cyanide. The waste water produced contains sulfur and cyanide compounds which may be removed by burning in a reducing atmosphere (technical scale trials are in progress). The Retu ammonia process depends on absorption of ammonia from waste gas by a weak acid solution of ammonia bisulfite. The ammonia absorbed cannot be regenerated but the ammonia sulfite can be converted to bisulfite. The process involves no production of waste water. The Sidmar Otto process for H2S removal can be combined with the Retu process for ammonia. The USS phosphate process for removal of ammonia is based on absorption on mono ammonium phosphate solution which can be regenerated with the production of the ammonia in liquid form and almost anhydrous. The waste water is under high pressure and can therefore be used in various ways in other units of the coking plant.
Ключевые слова указателя: ammonia; hydrogen sulfide; coke oven; gas waste; therapy

Авторы: Haan J.
Название: Environmentally hygienic engines for motor vehicles (Dutch)
Авторы организаций: Haan, J.
Краткое описание: This article, one of a series, limits itself to diesel motors. The economy and efficiency of these motors is discussed. The yearly change and strengthening of worldwide norms for emissions produces a costly uncertainty in the automobile industry, which is exaggerated by fuel shortages. The most important emissions are CO, hydrocarbons, NO(x), and soot. Use of fuel with a low sulfur content, or with certain additives, can improve emmission characteristics. Soot is best reduced by good motor maintenance and adjustment. Other possible methods include earlier ignition, lower compression, turbocharging, and further development of stepped combustion. Motors using natural gas as fuel offer certain advantages over contemporary diesels, but offer less room for improvement, a lower power yield, and higher costs. Another attractive alternative is the 'hybrid' drive vehicle, which has a battery powered electric drive for congested urban areas, while a diesel motor and generator provide power in less congested districts. Other, purely electrical battery systems, such as those being tested in Manchester, England and in GFR, are evaluated.
Ключевые слова указателя: diesel engine; exhaust gas; pollution control; prevention; therapy

Авторы: Karnat L.
Название: Wastewater plant does nicely without natural gas, thank you
Организации: Sewage Treatm. Plant, City of Reading, Pa., United States
Авторы организаций: Karnat, L., Sewage Treatm. Plant, City of Reading, Pa., United States
Краткое описание: The sewage treatment plant at Reading (Pa.) has all its fuel gas requirements supplied by methane gas generated on site. A surplus of methane is produced, and the remainder is flared off. Two rotating vane type positive displacement meters were installed on each of the 2 primary digesters. These measure methane production, whether the digesters are operating properly and show the amount of methane used to heat the digesters.
Ключевые слова указателя: fuel; methane; sewage treatment; therapy

Авторы: Keeling C.D., Bacastow R.B., Bainbridge A.E.
Название: Atmospheric carbon dioxide variations at Mauna Loa Observatory, Hawaii
Организации: Scripps Inst. Oceanography, Univ. California San Diego, La Jolla, Calif., United States
Авторы организаций: Keeling, C.D., Scripps Inst. Oceanography, Univ. California San Diego, La Jolla, Calif., United States; Bacastow, R.B., Scripps Inst. Oceanography, Univ. California San Diego, La Jolla, Calif., United States; Bainbridge, A.E., Scripps Inst. Oceanography, Univ. California San Diego, La Jolla, Calif., United States
Краткое описание: The concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide at Mauna Loa Observatory, Hawaii is reported for eight years (1964-1971) of a long term program to document the effects of the combustion of coal, petroleum, and natural gas on the distribution of CO2 in the atmosphere. The new data, when combined with earlier data, indicate that the annual average CO2 concentration rose 3.4% between 1959 and 1971. The rate of rise, however, has not been steady. In the mid-1960's it declined. Recently it has accelerated. Similar changes in rate have been observed at the South Pole and are evidently a global phenomenon.
Ключевые слова указателя: carbon dioxide; air pollution; methodology

Название: TECHNICAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR ENERGY CONSERVATION IN THE U. S. PULP AND PAPER INDUSTRY.
Авторы организаций: Slinn, Ronald J.
Краткое описание: The paper and allied products industry ranks among the top four U. S. manufacturing industries in total energy consumption, but more than 40% of its energy requirements are met by self-generated fuels derived from process wastes. Recent sharp and substantial increases in costs of fossil fuels, combined with reduced availability of natural gas, have given the industry a strong incentive to conserve energy. The capital intensive nature of the industry limits the rate at which it can adopt more energy-thrifty technologies, but since so much of the energy used is for the evaporation of water, promising areas for investigation include high-consistency forming, or even dry forming. Other technologies with energy-saving potential are modified refining and higher-yield pulping processes which, however, would also reduce the fuel yield of spent pulping liquors. Despite the energy-saving potential in such technologies, the industry's future energy requirements per ton of output could rise if environmental standards currently proposed by government are to be met.
Ключевые слова указателя: Energy resources; Environmental protection; ENERGY CONSERVATION; Paper and pulp industry
Адрес для корреспонденции: Slinn, Ronald J.

Авторы: Anon
Название: COMPARATIVE RISK-COST-BENEFIT STUDY OF ALTERNATIVE SOURCES OF ELECTRICAL ENERGY.
Авторы организаций: Anon
Краткое описание: This study quantifies, normalizes, and compiles conventional and societal costs associated with the production of electrical energy by currently available alternative systems based on coal, gas, nuclear fuels, and hydroenergy. Particular emphasis is placed on examining each energy system in its entirety - both the power plant and its supporting fuel cycle. However, the study is restricted to routine impacts, including routine accidents whose frequencies can be established from historical data. From the available data, which are thoroughly referenced herein, it is concluded that natural gas incurs minimal environmental- and human-impact costs but remaining supplies are small; oil presents considerably greater environmental and human impacts but substantially less than those from coal, which is both the most serious environmental offender and the most abundant domestic fuel source. Nuclear fuels, which are abundant natural resources, have somewhat less environmental and human impacts than gas. The conventional fuel costs of coal and nuclear fuel cycles are comparable and considerably less expensive than gas or oil, but it appears that the cost of abatement and health and safety measures will significantly increase the cost of energy from coal over that from nuclear fuel.
Ключевые слова указателя: Accident prevention; Coal; ELECTRIC POWER PLANTS - Fuels; Environmental protection; Nuclear energy; Electric power generation

Авторы: Bories G., Tulliez J.
Название: Determination of 3, 4-benzopyrene in spiruline algae produced and treated by various procedures [Dětermination du 3, 4-benzopyrěne dans les algues spirulines produites et traitěes suivant diffěrents procěděs]
Название источника: Annales de la nutrition et de l"alimentation
Авторы организаций: Bories, G.; Tulliez, J.
Краткое описание: Spirulina algae grow in highly salted natural lakes. Artificial cultivation in tanks with addition of carbon dioxide (natural gas, burned gases) has been studied in order to improve the biosynthesis. A possible 3, 4-benzopyrene (BaP) contamination must be then considered. Several BaP determinations have been performed in batches of algae from bath origins, prepared following different processes (filtration, spray, cylinder drying). BaP contents are very low (2 to 3 ppb) and comparable between batches.
